entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Grid can't use star and auto together in version 7.0.81 #14520
  • Window title bar is not accessible when the Windows platform targeted .NET MAUI App is run as an Unpackaged type #14518
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Could not resolve type with token 010001db from typeref (.NET MAUI) #14515
  • Landscape Mode Splash Screen issue in .NET 8 Preview 2 #14514
    .NET 8 Planning
  • 8.0.0-preview.3.8149 Whether it can be used in visual studio 17.5.3 #14513
  • Fresh MAUI app #14512
  • Cannot select Item of CollectionView when used ZIndex #14509
  • [WinUI] Replacing CollectionView ItemSource does not clear underlying children from VisualTree #14507
    Backlog
  • [iOS/Catalyst] CollectionView VisualDiagnostic Item Registration is broken #14506
    Backlog

Closed

  • MAUI WebView doesn't allow to web session to inspected in Safari developer tools (Mac Catalyst) #7706
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Android WebView Source is Non-Functional #14496
  • Automatically add the Get Task Allow entitlement to Mac Catalyst apps when building for debugging #13080
    Backlog
  • Update Templates to Make Developing a Maui Blazor MacCatalyst app a Better Experience #14219
    Backlog
  • Blazor Hybrid Mac Catalyst Dev Tools not Supported #5561
    Backlog
  • Maui : iOS - Switch color doesn't revert on off #14426
  • [Shell][iOS] Page Title is wrong when navigating #14434
  • wwwroot resources in shared/rcl assemly are not served under _contents/{assembly} in hybrid wpf blazor app #14504
  • Error when using DisplayAlert in override void onAppearing #12739
    Backlog
  • Run Maui MSI on window server 2019 not working #14482
  • Cannot debug iOS 16.4 #14503
  • [Windows] Faced no installed components were detected exception #8997

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Allow early use of DeviceDisplay.Current.MainDisplayInfo #14521
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞
  • Switch to AppWindowTitleBar From SetTitleBar #14517

Merged

  • Updated Templates for Blazor apps for MacCatalyst #14196
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI
  • `FocusRequest` is now a `RetrievePlatformValueRequest` #14475
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Android.Material from 1.7.0.2 to 1.8.0 #13618
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.4.0 to 4.5.0 #13581
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net8.0] Merge main net8.0 branch #14502
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1661.34 to 1.0.1722.32 #14510
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [xamlc] fix build error for System.Private.CoreLib #14492
    area/Xaml </>
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #14501
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Propagate Title to android and ios window #14413
  • [net7.0] Fix edge case with Grids, *s, and unconstrained layouts #14369
    area/layout 🔲

Updated

  • Make Benchmarks.Droid runnable as APK for perf testing #14447
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Adding ContentInsets to iOS Keyboard Scrolling #14371
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • [uitests] Work for get appium uitests with CI #14488
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Tests] Move sample build test to IntegrationTests #14499
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Lifecycle.LiveData from 2.5.1.2 to 2.6.1 #14291
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [controls] fix memory leak in `CollectionView` #14329
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [CI] Do not rebuild the ms tasks on device tests. #14476
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Build Debug and Release device tests #14392
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Centralize logic for handling logical children #14132
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
